name: Tech Gadget Box
description: Get the latest tech gadgets delivered to your door every month. From headphones to smart home devices, we've got you covered.

name: Beauty & Glow
description: Discover new beauty products with our curated selection of skincare, makeup, and haircare items.

name: Bookworm's Delight
description: Dive into a new world with our hand-picked books. Choose your favorite genre and let us surprise you.

name: Fitness Fanatic
description: Stay fit and healthy with our fitness box. Includes workout gear, supplements, and healthy snacks.

name: Gourmet Snacks
description: Treat yourself to delicious gourmet snacks from around the world. Perfect for movie nights or office cravings.

name: Pet Lovers
description: Spoil your furry friend with toys, treats, and accessories. Tailored for dogs and cats.
